headline: Sempra’s SoCalGas Showcases Fuel Flexible Microgrids And CHP At World Ag Expo
summary: SoCalGas, a Sempra (NYSE:SRE) subsidiary, is presenting microgrid and combined heat and power solutions at the World Ag Expo in California's San Joaquin Valley. The showcase focuses on fuel flexible systems designed to support resilient energy infrastructure for critical agricultural and community operations. The event highlights Sempra's role in projects aimed at reliable and sustainable power for essential services in the region. Sempra, trading on the NYSE under ticker NYSE:SRE, enters...
